title: Huawei Watch_How can I set Dual City to display the time for two cities?
answer: Touch and hold the home screen, select the settings icon ![](http://app.huawei.com/tkb/ha-i/73455_h16wx.png "click to enlarge") underneath **Dual City**, and select the desired city. Once you have configured the settings, the time for the selected city will be displayed at the top of the watch face. The local time will be displayed underneath.
